report.title: User survey contribution summary
report.description: A breakdown of totals describing a user's contribution within the context of a survey.
report.query:
select 1 as sort, 'MY_RECORDS' as code, 'My records for survey' as qualifier, count(distinct o.id) as value from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.created_by_id=#user_id# and o.survey_id=#survey_id# union
select 2 as sort, 'MY_RECORDS_YEAR', 'My records for survey this year' as qualifier, count(distinct o.id) as value from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.created_by_id=#user_id# and o.survey_id=#survey_id# and extract(year from o.date_start) = extract(year from now())
union
select 3, 'MY_SPECIES', 'My species for survey' as qualifier, count(distinct case o.zero_abundance when true then null else o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key end) from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.created_by_id=#user_id# and o.survey_id=#survey_id#
union
select 4, 'MY_SPECIES_YEAR', 'My species for survey this year' as qualifier, count(distinct case o.zero_abundance when true then null else o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key end) from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.created_by_id=#user_id# and o.survey_id=#survey_id# and extract(year from o.date_start) = extract(year from now())
union
select 5, 'MY_RECORDS_VERIFIED', 'My records verified to date' as qualifier, count(distinct o.id) from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.created_by_id=#user_id# and o.survey_id=#survey_id# and o.record_status='V'
union
select 6, 'LEAGUE_POSITION', 'league position' as qualifier, value from ( select o.created_by_id, row_number() over (order by count(DISTINCT CASE o.zero_abundance WHEN true THEN NULL ELSE o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key END) desc) as value from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.survey_id=#survey_id# group by o.created_by_id ) as sub where created_by_id=#user_id#
union
select 5, 'TOTAL_RECORDS', 'Total records for survey', count(distinct o.id) from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.survey_id=#survey_id#
union
select 6, 'MY_RECORDS_ON_SYSTEM', 'My records total', count(distinct o.id) from cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.created_by_id=#user_id#
